documents.document: @mathie_tremas I can never remember the rule - is it always pigs before fish?
@JasonCT @TweedySean Gone an age ago, its novelty tee-shirts now ghosts.
@shinyford @bigfinish Correct answer! :)
Graceless title sequence by clever Tom Saunders. https://t.co/NRndNrVf2g MY NAME IN BIG LETTERS. @bigfinish
@ctokelly Too bloody right.
@ctokelly An episode of Buffy the Vampire Slayer has a snot creature from outer space, so there is a precedent in science.
@ctokelly But sir, in what medium were the weeing fish suspended as they weed? (It is a mighty long time since we bickered in philosophy.)
@barnabysalton @newscientist a wee bit.
@NothingLane @WhoSFX ha! Excellent knowledge!
You’d never see homo sapiens behaving like this. (Care of @newscientist.) https://t.co/G6gjNP56ai
@JasonCT Perhaps @pauljmcgann could be the assistant to the lady Doctor.
@LondonConcrete @mwrightwriter @20000streets My son does not allow me to sing any more. It sounds wrong.
@davidwhittam @20000streets Shocking.
@LondonConcrete @20000streets It's the lovely moment mid-February when I'm free of some sizeable deadlines I am living for.
@LondonConcrete @20000streets It has been an extremely long January.
@davidwhittam @20000streets Yes, but when have you been a good example of anything?
@JasonCT @20000streets I've had at least one of those today.
@LondonConcrete @20000streets Right in the midst of it, but in reported speech.
@grahamsleight Twitter would be much improved if it all had to be run past @20000streets.
In what is surely a sign of the End of Times, steadfast sub-editor @20000streets has allowed me an exclamation mark.
@WJHayesJr And the Doctor's fondness for fishing in The Androids of Tara and A Christmas Carol.
@philippa22 @thejimsmith I'm so sorry.
@thejimsmith You have clearly never worked in development.
@thejimsmith Hand mines > Clams > Goldish on wheels > Dalek
THIS IS HOW THE DALEKS STARTED https://t.co/VAccHbLt9X
@E11iotChapman Elliot, have you been seeing *other* writers?
@LondonConcrete @drwhofan_194 @The_Cybermatt @thejimsmith @getfandom I hope you have nightmares.
@LondonConcrete @drwhofan_194 @The_Cybermatt @thejimsmith @getfandom If you listen carefully, the Seethe are saying "Neil Corry is a poo."
@amycockram my pleasure - and me too! A great convention
“You’d think you’d get used to men yelling, but you never do,” says Call The Midwife, sadly.
@stuart_manning @AbnerBrowne I used to be teased at university for sounding like Worzel.
@stuart_manning Lord of Chaos bewitched by the weirdness of the pictures https://t.co/xyqTPEvwYN
@stuart_manning @AbnerBrowne His folks were in Kings Somborne, on the road to Romsey (where I was born) and Brashfield.
@Execcer The Scientific Secrets of Doctor Who.
@AbnerBrowne @stuart_manning Yes, me, too. Though not nearly as traumatising as the Mara.
@AbnerBrowne @stuart_manning I believe my best mate’s house can be glimpsed in some episodes - but have never dared check.
@AbnerBrowne @stuart_manning It’s like The Wicker Man for kids. And filmed down the road from where I grew up. Brrr.
@AbnerBrowne @stuart_manning So much of it is eerie. But it’s him falling over at the end of the closing credits that cut through me.
What an absolute delight is The Worzel Book by @stuart_manning - though the show till profoundly terrifies me.
@Execcer Hello! Yes - and I meant to say how much I like Strangeness in Space. :)
(TARDIS by @themindrobber’s dad.)
@fwhiffahder It can do - I tried to leave it open so it’s up to you :)
@fwhiffahder More to come. I’m meeting @mwrightwriter in a few weeks to discuss exactly how it might work…
@claytonhickman @WhoSFX In “The Switching”, the Master fails to steal the TARDIS but alters the interior settings to annoy the Doctor.
@fwhiffahder Well, that’s very kind of you! All credit to @TheLisaBowerman, @mwrightwriter and an amazing cast :)
@JohnJJohnston @jonnymorris1973 @wavenode @Andr3wSmith @nimbos Marco Polo and The Romans also bodyswerve historical evidence :)
@wavenode @Andr3wSmith @nimbos Particularly pleased to get a like for that from @JohnJJohnston. You see? Sometimes I listen.
@jonnymorris1973 @wavenode @Andr3wSmith @nimbos So Pyramids of Mars is a historical?
@wavenode @Andr3wSmith @nimbos Strictly speaking, they need to be set after the invention of writing.
@WhoSFX @thejimsmith @LondonConcrete That is exactly how the Eleventh Doctor would go about it.
@nimbos It is true. Calling the story 100,000 BC imposes that on it.
@thejimsmith @LondonConcrete @WhoSFX “… go to a naked foam party, in a nightclub run by the Ice Warriors.”
@LondonConcrete @thejimsmith @WhoSFX The with sounded more Craig.
@thejimsmith @LondonConcrete @WhoSFX “So, Jim… Don’t share this with anyone else but Mike and Sara and the Valeyard…”
@LondonConcrete @thejimsmith @WhoSFX Aw, imagine the radiant delight Craig would have found in that picture.
@thejimsmith @WhoSFX Me, too. I bet mine is the more ridiculous.
@nimbos @JoeMacleish Doctor Who will sneak off to smoke some weed, and get into a rumpus.
@thejimsmith @WhoSFX Leaving Sara Kingdom and Mike Yates to save Earth from the New Mechanoids.
@nimbos @JoeMacleish THIS IS EXCITING
@claytonhickman @WhoSFX FACT: My first ever professionally published work of fiction explains why the TARDIS looks like that.
@bluebox99 @robstradling It might save your life.
@robstradling @bluebox99 You haven’t heard my singing.
@EdSalt @LondonConcrete @Gary_Gillatt @jonnymorris1973 Ooh! Ah. *fireworks fizzle cheaply on video*
@LondonConcrete @Gary_Gillatt @jonnymorris1973 But @marekkukula may have other ideas. He’s quite good at this stuff.
@LondonConcrete @Gary_Gillatt @jonnymorris1973 lots of chemicals can produce green: boron compounds, copper sulphate (used in fireworks)
@LondonConcrete @Gary_Gillatt @jonnymorris1973 well, it suggests different physical and / or chemical properties to N-space.
@sshabein beats working for a living :)
@sshabein Filler?!? This is quality core content. You should see what other nonsense I wrote.
Six years since the publication of my finest contribution to Doctor Who Adventures. https://t.co/QWHg0bwV4X
@SamiraAhmedUK Then don’t do it.
@andychulka @RadioFreeSkaro You belong to us. You will be like us.
@marekkukula @ChristelDee @gossjam "Let me show you an experiment in the relative motion of bodies," he said...
@ChristelDee @gossjam @marekkukula I wouldn't trust my tangerines with those two.
@CouncillorEd @planetmondas @CiaraJanson @LDoddington @bigfinish You can give any old toot to a cast like that and it'll sound amazing :)
@CouncillorEd @planetmondas @CiaraJanson @LDoddington @bigfinish Thanks, Ed! So glad you enjoyed it.
@rudemrlang That's nothing. My writing is atrocious.
@nimbos @theotherdebs Ooh! I went with some friends when it was there before, and concluded it would be better taking children :)
@ythos @unamccormack @EddieRobson I’m scared of her, too.
@unamccormack @EddieRobson And does he obey??? I’d marry @ythos for that. :)
@unamccormack @EddieRobson Mr Tickle can, while still in bed, reach an arm down to the kitchen for a biscuit. He’s pretty much perfect
Reading this at the moment. It’s horrifically good. https://t.co/w4IK8cvo2S
@SamiraAhmedUK Christopher Plummer and David Warner as Shakespeare-quoting Klingons!
@SamiraAhmedUK I adore that film - and often use the soundtrack when writing
@FernRiddell Also the War Doctor. Happy birthday Fern!
@philip_ayres @TravisinaB7 Ha ha! That’s fab!
@edwardrussell @bigfinish @unamccormack Literally from the sublime to the ridiculous :)
@jamiesmart And me. The thing that dates it is now little the girl has to do.
@dmgutierrez “Fat bottomed dinosaurs” doesn’t fit the tune.
@NothingLane @claytonhickman @JonPreddle @Andydrewz That picture quickens the beat of my old heart
@Nyssa1968 exactly
@CameronKMcEwan Do you think he learnt this from Iguanadon - The Dinosaur With The Fat Bottom?
Now this is how you grab a reader’s attention at the start of a book. https://t.co/IxtPTBysXq
@jamiesmart yes, massively. I love that film - and have been much teased for it
@arrroberts The Spice Girls. #DunePop
@StatusAzure @RadioFreeSkaro @MrsSteveMOBrien @benmorrisillo Hooray! But we are all in the shadow of the 1975 Doctor Who Monster Book :)
@2cajuman2 @marekkukula @ThomJacksonWood impecable taste! Happy Christmas!
@Siskoid It was an entry qualification
I’ve had freelance gigs like this. (At Charles Dickens House Museum) https://t.co/Qf5g3zl4Nz
Among the sacred relics - a window frame - at the Charles Dickens Museum. https://t.co/XhlyJOeTAH
@benwoodhams Innit.
